properties.ariaLabel: duplicate values appear in tooltip permalink

children.value: When drawing an area chart, you often encounter the problem as shown in the figure below, but there are two values on the tooltip for the same data.

: Because chart.area() and chart.line() are configured with different colors in the code, the color is considered in the tooltip deduplication rule, and different colors are regarded as different data.
You can close one of the tooltips, for example
